title: Hotel for Sale in Sigiriya
details:
Hotel for Sale in Sigiriya (Inamaluwa Junction)

10 rooms fully air conditioned (Single, Double Triple and Family rooms) with TV, attached bathrooms with hot & cold water.

Can be increased to 35 rooms

Fully air conditioned Banquet Hall, Restaurant with a seating capacity of 60 pax, Swimming Pool, Mini Bar, Car Park & Large Garden

Staff Quarters, Drivers Quarters, and more than 7000 sq.ft

Land area about 60 perches

Price - 90 Million (Negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD ,
COLOMBO 03
